alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Garland; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 11:55AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Garland, south central Yell and northeastern Montgomery Counties through 1230 PM CDT... At 1155 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Muddy Creek WMA, or 14 miles northeast of Mount Ida, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Avant... Mt Tabor... Fannie... Chula... Story... Washita... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Garland; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations; Yell Excluding Northwest
